title: Revolting Rhymes
brief_description: In this animated film, Roald Dahl, the master of comic stories for children retells the stories of “Snow White”, “Jack and the beanstalk”, “Little Red Riding Hood”, “The three little pigs”, “Goldilocks and the three bears” and “Cinderella” introducing colourful and amusing twists to these well known stories. The animation is based on the original illustrations by Quentin Blake.
